title: Out of Their Element
description: Host Meg Wolitzer presents two works in which characters are out of their element.  Literally, in the case of Robert Coover’s witty reworking of the fable “The Frog Prince,” who finds human life exhausting.  Parker Posey reads the story.  In Cristina Henriquez’s “Chasing Birds” a married couple share an exotic holiday locale, but not much else. It’s voiced by Maryann Plunkett, who also comments on the story at the end of her read. The story is introduced by writer and bird aficionado Amy Tan.
author: mary.shimkin@symphonyspace.org (Symphony Space)
